pages.text: Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Dwtn - WestEdge Important Announcements Conveniently located near Downtown Charleston Experience true Southern hospitality at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Downtown-WestEdge. Conveniently located just minutes from Charleston’s historic district, our hotel is the perfect home base for exploring the charm and beauty of the Lowcountry. Enjoy easy access to the vibrant WestEdge Retail Center, Joe Riley Baseball Field—home of the Charleston Riverdogs—and top institutions like The Citadel, College of Charleston, and The Medical University of South Carolina (MUSC). Plus, we're centrally located near Charleston’s historic plantations, scenic golf courses, and pristine beaches. If you’d rather relax at the hotel, we offer a complimentary Express Start® hot breakfast buffet, a beautiful outdoor saltwater pool, and a spacious lobby lounge. Unwind on our open patio terrace while taking in the city views, or enjoy the comfort of our modern and well-appointed guest rooms. At Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston Downtown-WestEdge, you’ll find exceptional service, modern amenities, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every stay memorable.
